sage.texture

Class TextureManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • sage.texture.TextureManager

  • public class TextureManager
extends java.lang.Object
    TextureManager provides static methods for building and managing a cache of Texture objects. Note: TextureManager uses ImageIO to read image files; the image file type passed to any of the TextureManager load methods must be a file type recognized by that class (e.g. JPG, GIF, PNG, or BMP).
    Author:
    John Clevenger

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Texture.MagnificationFilter DEFAULT_MAG_FILTER
      The default magnification filter mode for cached textures if the client does not explicitly set the mode.
      static Texture.MinificationFilter DEFAULT_MIN_FILTER
      The default minification filter mode for cached textures if the client does not explicitly set the mode.

    • Method Detail

      • loadTexture2D

        public static Texture loadTexture2D(java.lang.String fileName)
        Loads into the texture cache a Texture object using the image data contained in the specified file and using default values for the Texture.MinificationFilter and Texture.MagnificationFilter settings.
        Parameters:
        fileName - - the file containing the image data
        Returns:
        the resulting Texture object, or null if an error occurs during loading

      • loadTexture2D

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the resulting Texture object, or null if an error occurs during loading

      • loadTexture2D

        public static Texture loadTexture2D(java.net.URL url)
        Loads into the texture cache a Texture object using the image data contained in the specified URL and using default values for the Texture.MinificationFilter and Texture.MagnificationFilter settings.
        Parameters:
        url - - the location containing the image data
        Returns:
        the resulting Texture object, or null if an error occurs during loading

      • loadTexture2D

        public static Texture loadTexture2D(java.net.URL url,
                                    Texture.MinificationFilter minFilter,
                                    Texture.MagnificationFilter magFilter)
        Loads into the texture cache a Texture object using the image data contained in the specified URL and using the specified Texture.MinificationFilter and and Texture.MagnificationFilter modes.
        Parameters:
        url - - the location containing the image data
        minFilter - the Texture minification filter mode
        magFilter - the Texture magnification filter mode
        Returns:
        the resulting Texture object, or null if an error occurs during loading

      • addToCache

        public static void addToCache(Texture t)
        Adds the specified Texture object to the TextureManager's texture cache. If the cache already contains a Texture with the same TextureKey, the old Texture is discarded.
        Parameters:
        t - - the Texture to be added to the cache

        Returns:
